DataElement.preferredDefinition: The date and time the cryosettes were transferred to storage.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The study of the structure of the cells and their arrangement to constitute tissues and, finally, the association among these to form organs.  In pathology, the microscopic process of identifying normal and abnormal morphologic characteristics in tissues, by employing various cytochemical and immunocytochemical stains._A small shaped container used to create blocks of frozen specimens in a cryopreservative solution for future sectioning and microscopic analysis._The act of safekeeping goods in a depository._The act of conveying or transporting from one place to another.

Concepts.definition: The study of the structure of the cells and their arrangement to constitute tissues and, finally, the association among these to form organs. A small shaped container used to create blocks of frozen specimens in a cryopreservative solution for future sectioning and microscopic analysis.
